resources.string:
Weazr is a simple weather app that shows the current weather and a 10 day forcast using web service APIs provided by Open Weather Map. The weazr app android project including the library and test projects will be available on Github for anyone to download and modifiy 


. The main goal of this app is not to provide weather information services but to show software engineering princples in developing android apps. I understant there is no single killer way of doing an app but this is my take. Anyone is welcome to send in comments.
References 



All weather data displayed using this app is from 
 http://openweathermap.org
